title: Agentic AI for the Whole SLDC With Atlassian Rovo Dev Agents
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: Now in public beta, Atlassian Rovo dev agents integrate agentic AI across the software development lifecycle.
cntitle: 使用 Atlassian Rovo Dev Agents 为整个软件开发生命周期打造 Agentic AI
cndescription: Atlassian Rovo dev agents 现已推出公开测试版，它将 Agentic AI 集成到整个软件开发生命周期中。
